Class BankService

java.lang.Object
BankService
public class BankService extends Object
Provides high-level banking operations on existing account data.

The service acts as the business logic layer between:

  • UI (Console / JavaFX)
  • Domain model (Customer, Account, Transaction)
This class does not store or persist data itself. All data remains in memory until saved by FileManager classes on application exit.

Key Responsibilities:

  • Finding accounts
  • Creating accounts
  • Processing transfers (internal & external)
  • Applying monthly interest updates

Important Business Rule:
Only Debit Accounts can send transfers. Savings and Credit accounts must first transfer money to a Debit Account before external transfers.

  • Method Details

    • findAccountById

      public static Account findAccountById(List<Account> accounts, String accountId)
      Finds an account by its internal ID (e.g., "A004").
      Parameters:
      accounts - list of all accounts in memory
      accountId - ID to search
      Returns:
      matching account or null if not found

    • findAccountsByCustomer

      public static List<Account> findAccountsByCustomer(List<Account> accounts, String customerId)
      Returns all accounts owned by a specific customer.
      Parameters:
      accounts - list of all accounts
      customerId - ID of the owner
      Returns:
      list of accounts owned by that customer

    • createDebitAccount

      @Deprecated(forRemoval=true) public static DebitAccount createDebitAccount(List<Account> accounts, Customer customer, String currency)
      Deprecated, for removal: This API element is subject to removal in a future version.
      Creates a new Debit account with zero initial balance.
      Parameters:
      accounts - list of existing accounts
      customer - owner of the new account
      currency - currency (RON / EUR / USD)
      Returns:
      created DebitAccount

    • transferInternal

      public static void transferInternal(Account from, Account to, double amount)
      Transfers money between accounts belonging to the same customer. Currency conversion is handled automatically when needed.
      Parameters:
      from - source account (must be Debit)
      to - destination account (same customer)
      amount - positive transfer amount

    • transferExternal

      public static void transferExternal(Account from, Account to, double amount)
      Transfers funds from one customer to another.

      Business rules:

      • Source must be a Debit account
      • Destination can be any account type
      • Currency conversion occurs automatically
      • Transaction history records both sides with names
      Parameters:
      from - source account (must be Debit)
      to - destination account
      amount - amount to transfer (must be positive)

    • applyMonthlyProcessing

      public static void applyMonthlyProcessing(List<Account> accounts)
      Applies monthly updates:
      • Savings â†’ adds interest
      • Credit â†’ increases owed balance
      • Debit â†’ no effect
      Parameters:
      accounts - all existing accounts
